abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the construction
            and operation of all of the facilities needed for the mining
            and metallurgical processing of lateritic ore for the
            industrial production of ferronickel. The project consists
            of: processing plant and mining facilities, thermal unit and
            associated facilities, preproduction expenses, financial
            charges, and working capital.
